post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Please try to install j2eesdk on your machine as per J2ee tutorial. If you have problem, bring up and let's discuss here or the seminar.
If you finish your design with class diagram or sequential diagram, make copy for others and let's discuss too. If no one prepare any item, it is OK, let's laugh and chat.
post.title: try to install j2eesdk
